resources.string: Tap button below to fetch some eats.
No places found, because location permission is disabled.
Sorry, no settings on free app.

Location permission should to be granted to use this app. Otherwise we can only use with a default location. You can go into Device settings->App->This app-> and Permissions to allow location requests.
Location is not enabled. If location isn\'t turned on, the default location or last known location will be used for demo.
